pages.blank: This page is blank page, if you see this page, it means that the route in under construction, please just ignore this

update.reloadIn3Seconds: The app will reload in 3 seconds.
update.newVersionOfApp: A new version of {{appName}} App is available. Click to update.

safari.closeCompletelyInstructions: Close Safari completely (swipe up â†’ swipe app away), then reopen from home screen.
safari.updateInstructions: To update the app on Safari, you must completely close the app:
safari.step1: Double-tap home button or swipe up from bottom
safari.step2: Find this app and swipe UP to close completely
safari.step3: Wait 2-3 seconds for Safari to fully close
safari.step4: Tap the app icon on home screen to reopen
safari.restartNote: Note: Simply switching between apps won't update Safari PWAs. A complete restart is required.

ios.step1: Tap the Share button in Safari toolbar
ios.step2: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'

mac.step2: Select 'Add to Dock' from the menu
mac.step3: The app will be added to your Dock for easy access

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.description: Enter the staff member's personal and contact information.

clockInPreview.title: Clock-in Access (Preview)
clockInPreview.description: This is a preview of what will be generated for the staff member. The actual URL will be created when you save the staff member.
clockInPreview.autoGenerateMessage: The clock-in URL and QR code will be automatically generated when you create the staff member.
clockInPreview.qrDescription1: Staff members can scan this QR code to quickly access their clock-in page.
clockInPreview.qrDescription2: The QR code can be printed or shared digitally.

workingPattern.title: Working Pattern & Rates
workingPattern.description: Configure the staff member's working hours, schedule type, and compensation rates.
workingPattern.fulltimeDescription: Full-time staff typically work a consistent schedule with standard weekly hours.
workingPattern.shiftDescription: Shift workers have flexible schedules with variable weekly hours.
workingPattern.additionalRatesDescription: These rates will be calculated automatically if left empty. You can override them with custom values.

accessPermissions.title: Access & Permissions
accessPermissions.description: Choose the appropriate role for this staff member. Each role has predefined permissions that control what the user can access and do in the system.
accessPermissions.memberDescription: Basic staff access - can view own profile and clock in
accessPermissions.managerDescription: Supervisor access - can manage staff and view reports
accessPermissions.adminDescription: Full access - can manage everything including store settings
accessPermissions.noPermissionsDefined: No permissions defined for the selected role.
accessPermissions.noteText: Permissions are automatically assigned based on the selected role. Custom permission management will be available in future updates.

permissions.manage_store: Configure store settings, operating hours, and location
permissions.manage_staff: Add, edit, and remove staff members
permissions.view_all_reports: Access all business reports and analytics
permissions.view_all_profiles: View detailed information of all staff members
permissions.clock_in: Access to clock in and out of shifts
permissions.view_reports: View reports relevant to managed teams
permissions.view_own_profile: View and edit personal profile information

leaveManagement.title: Leave Management
leaveManagement.description: Configure leave entitlements, balances, and calculation rules for the staff member.
leaveManagement.bookableLeaveDaysDescription: Total number of leave days the staff member is entitled to annually
leaveManagement.hoursPerDayDescription: Number of working hours equivalent to one leave day
leaveManagement.shiftWorkerAlert: For shift workers, leave is calculated in hours. Each leave day equals {{hours}} working hours.
leaveManagement.carryOverDaysDescription: Maximum days that can be carried over to the next year
leaveManagement.balancesDescription: Enter the current leave balances for this staff member. These will be updated as leave is taken.
leaveManagement.balanceExceedsWarning: Warning: Total leave balance exceeds annual entitlement. Please adjust the balances.
